Class GamesManager

extends DatabaseManager

    Clement Gautrais

      • removeGame

        public static boolean removeGame(int gameId)
        Remove all traces of the game id_game.
        Parameters:
        gameId - The id of the game to remove.
        Returns:
        True if the game has been removed, false otherwise.

      • addNewGame

        public static int addNewGame(boolean san)
        Create a new game and return the id created.
        Returns:
        The id of the new game, -1 if an error occurred.

      • updateGame

        public static boolean updateGame(int gameId,
                 java.lang.String fen)
        Update a game.
        Parameters:
        gameId - The id of the game to update.
        fen - The new fen.
        Returns:
        True if the update succeed. It can fail if the game doesn't exist in the database.

      • getNumberOfMoves

        public static int getNumberOfMoves(int gameId)
        Return the number of moves in the game gameId.
        Parameters:
        gameId - The id of the game concerned.
        Returns:
        The number of moves, -1 if problem encountered.

      • exist

        public static boolean exist(int gameId)
        Check if a game exist in the database.
        Parameters:
        gameId - The game id.
        Returns:
        True if the game exists.

      • addMoves

        public static boolean addMoves(int gameId,
               java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Double> resourcesConfidence,
               int moveNumber)
        Add a new move for reward.
        Parameters:
        gameId - The id of the game.
        resourcesId - The id of the resource.
        moveNumber - The move number.
        Returns:
        True if added, false otherwise.

      • getResourcesStats

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Double> getResourcesStats(int gameId)
        Get the ration of played move for each resources in a game. Return a map with the resource id as key and the ration of played move as value.
        Parameters:
        gameId - The id of the game to scan.
        Returns:
        The map or null if an error occurred.

      • isSAN

        public static java.lang.Boolean isSAN(int gameId)
        Parameters:
        gameId - The game id.
        Returns:
        True if the server must return SAN for this game, null if the game doesn't exist.
